metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13135 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A NULL Pointer Dereference exists in VideoLAN x265, as used in libbpg 0.9.7and other products, because the CUData::initialize function incommon/cudata.cpp mishandles memory-allocation failure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13135` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx265-146 - 2.6-3
x265 - 2.6-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: x265 package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6-3').
